manipulators.description: fn + Control + Option + Command + E: Enable Windows mapping
fn + Control + Option + Command + D: Disable Windows mapping

rules.description: Windows-to-Mac: fn key special cases (highest priority)

manipulators.description: fn + Shift + Tab → Control + Shift + Tab (simple mapping)
Right Option + Left Arrow → Option + Left Arrow (word skip left)
Right Option + Right Arrow → Option + Right Arrow (word skip right)
Right Option + Shift + Left Arrow → Option + Shift + Left Arrow (word select left)
Right Option + Shift + Right Arrow → Option + Shift + Right Arrow (word select right)
Right Option + Backspace → Option + Backspace (delete previous word)
fn + C in terminals → Control + C (kill process)
fn + D in terminals → Control + D (EOF)
fn + Z in terminals → Control + Z (suspend)
fn + L in terminals → Control + L (clear screen)
fn + A in terminals → Control + A (beginning of line)
fn + E in terminals → Control + E (end of line)
fn + F in terminals → Control + F (forward char)
fn + K in terminals → Control + K (kill line)
fn + N in terminals → Control + N (next command)
fn + P in terminals → Control + P (previous command)
fn + R in terminals → Control + R (reverse search)
fn + U in terminals → Control + U (kill line backward)
fn + Left Arrow → Option + Left Arrow (word skip left)
fn + Shift + Left Arrow → Option + Shift + Left Arrow (word select left)
fn + Right Arrow → Option + Right Arrow (word skip right)
fn + Shift + Right Arrow → Option + Shift + Right Arrow (word select right)
Control + Left Arrow → Command + Left Arrow (line start)
Control + Shift + Left Arrow → Command + Shift + Left Arrow (select to line start)
Control + Right Arrow → Command + Right Arrow (line end)
Control + Shift + Right Arrow → Command + Shift + Right Arrow (select to line end)
fn + Control + Left Arrow → Command + Up Arrow (document start)
fn + Control + Shift + Left Arrow → Command + Shift + Up Arrow (select to document start)
fn + Control + Right Arrow → Command + Down Arrow (document end)
fn + Control + Shift + Right Arrow → Command + Shift + Down Arrow (select to document end)
fn + Backspace → Option + Backspace (delete previous word)
fn + Up Arrow → Up Arrow (prevent default Page Up behavior)
fn + Down Arrow → Down Arrow (prevent default Page Down behavior)
fn + E → Command + E (use selection for find)
fn + J → Command + J (jump to selection)
Left Command → Left Option (Windows Alt equivalent)
Right Command → Right Option (Windows Alt equivalent)
Left Option → Left Command (Windows Meta equivalent)
